item.description:
Our meetup for this weekend is sold out. If you missed out please be sure to check out our event for next weekend and be sure to RSVP early. Hope to see you there!

http://www.meetup.com...

Dan

The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge on President's Day weekend to celebrate the long weekend! We have 3 days of fun planned out with the area mountains being as close as 2 miles from our lodge. This weekend is also Valentine's Day so if you are single the Bretts is a great place to be this weekend.

Our lodge is located within 2 minutes of Attitash and 20 minutes of Bretton Woods and Wildcat. This is a great weekend to come ski with a great group of people and have some fun afterwards. Guests are welcome for $20 per night lodging at the club. Full details and information will be sent to all Yes RSVPs.

All members and guests must be 21+

Hope to see you there!
item.name: SOLD OUT! President's Day Weekend at the Bretts, February 12 - 15th, 2010
